properties.name: spring.dict.jackson.enable
properties.description: Turn Jackson's dictionary parsing on or off

properties.name: spring.dict.redis-first
properties.description: Whether to enable redis as a dictionary cache first

properties.name: spring.dict.loaded-default
properties.description: Whether to load default dictionary data after the program starts

properties.name: spring.dict.locale-argument-resolver
properties.description: Whether to enable the Locale parameter resolver based on the spring framework

properties.name: spring.dict.small-batch-size
properties.description: The minimum threshold for bulk operations

properties.name: spring.dict.big-batch-size
properties.description: The maximum threshold for bulk operations

properties.name: spring.dict.cache-key
properties.description: The prefix of the Redis cache key( default value: "cacheable:dict:")

properties.name: spring.dict.dict-table
properties.description: The name of the dictionary table( default: "global_dictionary" )

properties.name: spring.dict.lang-table
properties.description: The name of the dictionary language table( default: "global_dictionary_lang" )

properties.name: spring.dict.column-wrap-text
properties.description: The wrapping character for the table column
